extendedInfo.description: The number one selling sleep aid app from BlackBerry now even better on Android. Over 250,000 downloads and over 1000 positive reviews. This paid version includes:- 12 new sounds including: Babbling stream, Crickets and Frogs, Formula 1, Howling Gale, Stream under a Bridge, Vacuum Cleaner, Waterfall, White Noise, Wind Chimes, Wood Fire and 2 types of rain.- No adverts *What users are saying*"This app is awesome, the loops are seemless and the sounds aren't annoying like most - I use this almost every night." - dbdragrex"Fantastic app! Seamless sound overlap. Love the ability to set a timer for the sounds and the fact it fades out. Slept so much better since using it!" - Tray CJ"My wife and I drift off to sleep to the sounds of the waves every night. Great app with no issues. Def recommend this app to anyone" - marcus william123Each sound has been professionally mastered and seamlessly looped to create a perfect audio environment for relaxation and sleep. Soundscapes include: * Waves on a beach - Relax and listen to the waves roll in as the sun goes down.* City Noise - Let the sounds of Tokyo city at night gently lull you to sleep.* Crickets and Frogs - The dusk chorus of crickets and frogs in South Africa will soothe and calm your spirit.* Waterfall - Lounge by this beautiful waterfall and let your stress wash away. Perfect for Tinnitus sufferers.* Wind Chimes - Imagine yourself in a Thai temple, with a gentle wind blowing through these long tubular chimes.Other sounds include torrential rain, kitten purring, rain on a tent, thunder storm, tropical rainforest, white noise (to really block out the outside world) and many more..Features: * Over 20 high quality, seamlessly looped sounds* Beautiful photos of each sound* Timer function * Linear fade out gently changes sound volume while you drift off to sleepDream Sounds has been proven to help children sleep as well. Just choose a sound (Wind Chimes is great) and set the timer to help your little one calm down before going to sleep.For any questions, feedback or support contact support@chonk.co.uk

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Soothing and relaxing. One of the best I have come across.
reviews.author: Joanne Loffel

reviews.comment: Awesome. Highly recommend. Listen to it everynight. Loops seemlessly. Please add more sounds.\tExcellent quality.had it on my BlackBerry. So glad to be able to have it on my android. Highly recommend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Miracle kids sleep aid.
reviews.comment: This app is awesome after only 5 minutes both of my sons are asleep. Unfortunately I cannot do anything else on my phone for the rest of the night. If this app could run in the back ground I would give it 6 stars.
reviews.author: Becky Venanzio

reviews.title: Wonderful app!!
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app!! The sound is great!! Great job!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay app
reviews.comment: Seems to make a skipping sound in all the different sounds. Please fix this bug cause this app is really annoying to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looping Problem!
reviews.comment: Please fix the looping problem! Sounds like a CD skipping every few seconds! I loved this app on my BlackBerry coz the sounds were seamless. Please fix this problem for Android phones then I will write a great review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthwhile
reviews.comment: Love the Wind Chimes. After surfing many apps for sound environments, I find that most samples are too abrasive. So finding one that I really like is totally worth downloading the whole app.
reviews.author: Sean Seals

reviews.title: Lacking that little something
reviews.comment: Sounds are lovely...but. Some obvious loop glitches. A mixing facility would be nice. Move to sd card would be priority but top of list SEAGULLS please. Seagulls get you 5 stars.
reviews.author: jon higgs

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: Best sounds. Great customer service. I paid for the next level and very happy.
reviews.author: Christine McAllister

reviews.title: Great Job.
reviews.comment: This is my favorite nature sounds app...after trying out a lot of others! Realistic sounds and good looping.
reviews.author: Kimberly Nance

reviews.title: Superior to the rest! LG Optimus
reviews.comment: Great sounds!  Crystal clear and seamless flow. As a person who suffers greatly in the evening hours due to chronic pain, I really appreciate this wonderful app!  Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Sylvia Olley

reviews.title: Donna de
reviews.comment: Amazing quality, enjoy this app every night. Smooth loop in the relaxing sounds, makes it so u can drift peacefully to sleep. There are no audible starts n stops, like i found in other simular apps. Many sounds to choose from, you will find the one to lull you to sleep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good value!
reviews.comment: This app has a large variety of sounds-some very unusual--and is very simple to use.
reviews.author: Douglas Wachtel

reviews.title: Gorgeous. But imperfect.
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Really helps you calm your mind and wash off the stress, and not only when drifting off to sleep. However, it does have one flaw that prevents me from giving it 5 stars: most of the \"modes\" indeed loop seamlessly and quietly, but in some of them the pause is too long and too noticeable. Spoils the whole experience turning them on.
reviews.author: Constantine Sipunin

reviews.title: Zzzzzzzzzzzzz.......
reviews.comment: I love this app. Insomniacs, buy the full version and start getting some real sleep for a change!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Workzzzzzzs
reviews.comment: Would give 8 stars if there were a few more choices and didn\'t have silly sounds such as a vacuum or formula 1 sounds that you get when you purchase the app. So don\'t buy this app for the extras. The free version is perfectly fine. And I agree with others regarding the looping and not being able to multitask with my phn.
reviews.author: Meghan Nightingale

reviews.title: Samsung s 3 user
reviews.comment: Works great. Relaxing sounds and love that it has a timer so it doesn\'t play all night, just enough to fall asleep
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HD sans customizing.
reviews.comment: Great clarity of sound, images and literature set up. Too bad you are unable to mix the sounds together. Thank you for no ads.
reviews.author: Caitlin Halpin

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Short loops with audible gaps between loops.  (Very distracting.) Can\'t play more than one like other similar apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is perfect for the insomniac in me and i\'m sure it\'ll be perfect for the insomniac in you :-)
reviews.author: sharon sanchez
